analysis.description:
TipSmartToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/26/0xe02dda4f103f3e66a63c2a90e503b44266e7f099.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0xe02dda4f103f3e66a63c2a90e503b44266e7f099.sol#220-232)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/26/0xe02dda4f103f3e66a63c2a90e503b44266e7f099.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.0', '^0.4.18']
	- /unique_chucks/26/0xe02dda4f103f3e66a63c2a90e503b44266e7f099.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18
	- /unique_chucks/26/0xe02dda4f103f3e66a63c2a90e503b44266e7f099.sol#250 declares pragma solidity^0.4.0

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0xe02dda4f103f3e66a63c2a90e503b44266e7f099.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/26/0xe02dda4f103f3e66a63c2a90e503b44266e7f099.sol#1): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (/unique_chucks/26/0xe02dda4f103f3e66a63c2a90e503b44266e7f099.sol#250): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/26/0xe02dda4f103f3e66a63c2a90e503b44266e7f099.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_numProposals' of Ballot.Ballot (/unique_chucks/26/0xe02dda4f103f3e66a63c2a90e503b44266e7f099.sol#261-262) is not in mixedCase
